name: Immortal Cleanup
description:
WASD to move.

Mouse to aim, mouse click or space to attack.

Esc to pause, any button to resume.

Picture a barren landscape, filled with trash. You, a noble broom wielding robot, are tasked with cleaning it all up.  However, when you die, your are joined to your past lives, which will heal you, until they too become toxic trash.  Well, that was the thought anyway.
